data.eml:eml: Camptotarsopoda annulitarsis Stein: redescription, description of terminalia and new record to South Africa (Diptera: Muscidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Couri, Márcia Souto (2014): Camptotarsopoda annulitarsis Stein: redescription, description of terminalia and new record to South Africa (Diptera: Muscidae). Zootaxa 3861 (5): 493-497, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3861.5.7
